```{r}
pca <- prcomp(mtcars)
biplot(pca)
```

```{r}
mtscale <- scale(mtcars)
mtcars
```

Let's plot `mpg` vs `disp` for both mtcars and after the scaled data in `mtscale`.

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars)+
  geom_point(aes(mpg,disp))

ggplot(mtscale)+
  geom_point(aes(mpg,disp))
```
